name: Chard, Lettuce, Pear, Ginger Smoothie
description: What do you do when there is a bunch of fresh greens sitting in the refrigerator and you cant eat a salad. Make them into a Smoothie!
recipeIngredient: 4-5  big Chard leaves and soft stems  (chopped)
generous pinch of fennel powder or cumin powder (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: In a deep pan or pressure cooker, put all the ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: In a deep pan or pressure cooker, put all the ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook on low-medium until pear is just about tender and the leaves wilted, or pressure cook for 1 whistle.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook on low-medium until pear is just about tender and the leaves wilted, or pressure cook for 1 whistle.

recipeInstructions.text: Let it cool, then blend. Add fresh lemon juice to taste, adjust salt, black pepper and water consistency.
recipeInstructions.name: Let it cool, then blend. Add fresh lemon juice to taste, adjust salt, black pepper and water consistency.
